mapper.select: SELECT peer_ip AS peer_ip_cidr, (peer_geoip ->> 'countryIso'::text) AS iso, (peer_geoip ->> 'cityName'::text) AS city, count(peer_ip) AS ban_count, count(distinct userapps_id) AS userapps_count FROM ban_history WHERE ((insert_time > #{afterTimestamp}) AND (module_name = #{moduleName})) GROUP BY peer_ip_cidr, iso, city ORDER BY ban_count DESC, userapps_count DESC LIMIT 1000

-- noinspection SqlShouldBeInGroupBy SELECT swarm_tracker.peer_ip AS st_peer_ip, swarm_tracker.torrent_id AS st_torrent_id, SUM(swarm_tracker.from_peer_traffic) AS st_from_peer_traffic, SUM(swarm_tracker.to_peer_traffic) AS st_to_peer_traffic, torrent.size AS t_torrent_size, SUM(swarm_tracker.to_peer_traffic) - torrent.size AS pure_to_peer_traffic FROM swarm_tracker JOIN torrent ON swarm_tracker.torrent_id = torrent.id WHERE (last_time_seen >= #{afterTimestamp}) AND (to_peer_traffic - from_peer_traffic) > 0 GROUP BY st_peer_ip, st_torrent_id, t_torrent_size ORDER BY pure_to_peer_traffic DESC LIMIT 1000

SELECT peer_ip, COUNT(DISTINCT torrent_id) AS torrent_count, COUNT(DISTINCT userapps_id) AS userapps_count FROM swarm_tracker WHERE last_time_seen >= #{afterTimestamp} GROUP BY peer_ip ORDER BY torrent_count DESC, userapps_count DESC LIMIT 1000
